message.raw:
Move almost everything from Global to a better place.
Moved simulation time and iteration related functions and variables to Simulation
Moved show* to world, I am not sure it is the best solution, at least avoid checking on every update and makes sense.
To implement it, I added a RegisterGeom to the World. It is just an equivalent of signals. Signals would isolate World from Geom and viceversa.
